plot: A comedy show which follows a modern village family and many of their neighbors, dealing with Serbian mentality during the beginning of XXI century.
plot_en: A comedy show which follows a modern village family and many of their neighbors, dealing with Serbian mentality during the beginning of XXI century.

title: Seljaci
